argumentsAndDecisions.complaintSummary: Landlord imposed unlawful rent increases and failed to register property with Rent Stabilization Program
argumentsAndDecisions.respondentHadNotice: Yes, city provided notice regarding registration requirements
argumentsAndDecisions.evidenceAssessment: Clear documentation of rent payments and lease terms showed improper rent increases
argumentsAndDecisions.impactAssessment: Tenant was overcharged significantly above lawful base rent
